words.name: bob
words.definition: A sweet fruit that is usually red, green, or yellow.

words.name: fake
words.definition: A long curved fruit with a yellow skin and soft, sweet, white flesh inside.

words.name: cat
words.definition: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur.

words.name: dog
words.definition: A domesticated carnivorous mammal with a barking sound.

words.name: elephant
words.definition: A large herbivorous mammal with a trunk and tusks.

words.name: bicycle
words.definition: A vehicle composed of two wheels held in a frame one behind the other.

words.name: computer
words.definition: An electronic device for storing and processing data.

words.name: pyramid
words.definition: A monumental structure with a square or triangular base and sloping sides.

words.name: giraffe
words.definition: A tall African mammal with a very long neck and forelegs.

words.name: helicopter
words.definition: A type of aircraft that derives both lift and propulsion from one or two sets of horizontally revolving rotors.

words.name: photosynthesis
words.definition: The process by which green plants and some other organisms use sunlight to synthesize foods from carbon dioxide and water.

words.name: antidisestablishmentarianism
words.definition: Opposition to the disestablishment of the Church of England.

words.name: quintessential
words.definition: Representing the most perfect or typical example of a quality or class.

words.name: onomatopoeia
words.definition: The formation of a word from a sound associated with what is named.
